all.body: Fixed issue #2710. Rearranged quick sort section and added more stuff.

all.message: style: format markdown files with remark-lint
Rearranged the content of quick sort. Added stuff including optimization and implementation.
refactor[stl-sort.md, quick-sort.md]: 排序相关 STL 	modified:   docs/basic/quick-sort.md 	modified:   docs/basic/stl-sort.md
all.body: 由于内省排序在 quick-sort 中也有介绍，与 stl-sort 中原有的部分重复，因此对其进行了一些删改。
